org.berthold.beamCalc

Class FormatSolutionString

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.berthold.beamCalc.FormatSolutionString

  • public class FormatSolutionString
extends java.lang.Object
    Static helper methods for building a mathematical term showing the solution of a resultig force in detail.
    Author:
    Berthold

    • Method Detail

      • partOfTermForSingleLoad

        public static java.lang.String partOfTermForSingleLoad(double force_N,
                                                       double angleOfLoadIn_deg,
                                                       double distance_m,
                                                       Beam beam,
                                                       int indexOfLoad)
        Left Bearing, for single loads. Helps building the term showing the solution for the left bearing. Returns "force x distance +" if more than two forces acting or "force x distance " if only one force is acting or the force is the last one acting.

      • partOfTermForLineLoad

        public static java.lang.String partOfTermForLineLoad(double lineLoad_N,
                                                     double lengthOfLineLoad_m,
                                                     double resultantDistanceFromLeftEnd_m,
                                                     Beam beam,
                                                     int indexOfLoad)
        Left bearing, for line loads. Helps building the term showing the solution for the left bearig.

      • solutionTermForHorizForces

        public static java.lang.String solutionTermForHorizForces(Load load)
        Horizontal loads. Helps building the solution term showing the sum of the horizontal loads.

      • solutionTermForRightBearing

        public static java.lang.String solutionTermForRightBearing(Beam beam,
                                                           BeamResult result,
                                                           java.lang.StringBuilder termForSolutionAtLeftBearing,
                                                           java.lang.String floatFormat)
        Right bearing. This builds the string containing the complete solution for the right bearing which is obtained by solving following equation: SummOfVerticalForces=0=F_Left-F1-F2-....-Fn+F_Right

      • addParatheses

        public static java.lang.String addParatheses(java.lang.String summand)
        Encloses a summand of a term in paratheses.
